mapper.select:
select a.TeamID, a.TeamRole, a.UserID,b.real_name,c.dict_label as TeamRoleName, b.hot_key from PM_TeamMember a, sys_user b, sys_dict_data c where a.UserID=b.user_id and a.TeamRole=c.dict_value and c.dict_type = '团队角色'
AND a.TeamID = #{teamid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND (b.real_Name like concat('%', #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or b.hot_key like concat('%', #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
order by a.TeamID,a.TeamRole, b.real_name
